thread.title: Selena Gomez to perform at 2015 American Music Awards
thread.title_full: Selena Gomez to perform at 2015 American Music Awards

author: Wires English | Press Trust of India
title: Selena Gomez to perform at 2015 American Music Awards
text:
Comments 
Los Angeles, Oct 23: Selena Gomez, Carrie Underwood and 5 Seconds of Summer would be among the stars taking the stage at the 2015 American Music Awards.All of them have confirmed their AMA appearances through their respective Twitter account. 
“Excited to perform at the @TheAMAs on 11.22! #RevivalAMAs,” Gomez wrote alongside a photo of hers. The newly-announced performers join Jennifer Lopez in the line-up. The songsterss will additionally host the annual ceremony, which this year will air live November 22 on ABC from the Microsoft Theatre in Los Angeles. 
Taylor Swift leads the nominees of the 2015 AMAs with six nods. Ed Sheeran and The Weeknd trail closely behind with five each. The three superstars are pitted against one another in the coveted Artist of the Year and Song of the Year categories.
